title: Having trouble with my pixel constantly rebooting. Wont load into OS.
content: Trying to get my phone to turn on, ive tried booting into safe mode and recovery mode. by holding down power and volume down. it seems that my power button is stuck pressed in, even though i can still feel a physical click when i press it. but when phone turns off if i only hold down the volume button i get the bios menu for booting into recovery mode or turning phone off or restarting bootloader
